overview: The protagonist is now 18 years old. At the age of 10 to 13 he weighed about 100 kilograms. He also had severe bronchitis. The parents, having no other option to cure him, decide to orient him in sports. He is now a three-time Balkan champion, and a one-time European champion, and aims to reach the pinnacle of success in the World.
title: Beyond the Dream
